Package co.edu.unbosque.persistence

Class FileMngr

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.persistence.FileMngr
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersonDAO
public class FileMngr extends Object implements PersonDAO
This is the main model class, contains all the implementations of the CRUD operations. The communication between the user and the file is made with FileInput/OutputStrem and ObjectInput/OutputStream.
Author:
Johann Toncon

  • Field Details

    • data

      private ArrayList<Person> data
      Looks like the persistence object, but it's not. This is used as an intermediary between user and the DAT file. When the user saves a contact, it is stored here and then is saved into the DAT file. When the user want to search a contact, it is retrieved here, and then shown to the user.

    • f

      private File f
      This is the pointer to the DAT file

  • Method Details

    • insert

      public boolean insert(Person person)
      The implementation of the Insert (CREATE) method, first, it checks that the new ID is not duplicated, if not, it opens a communication channel to the DAT file and send the data atribute with the new contact.
